meanings.definition: Worked beyond regular hours for extra pay.
meanings.sent1: She overtims at the factory to earn more money.
meanings.sent2: The employees overtimed to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat overtims chasing its tail around the house.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his job overtims everyone else's efforts.
meanings.sent5: The sun overtims its stay in the sky during summer, shining longer hours.

meanings.sent1: After a long day, he finally received his overtims.
meanings.sent2: The manager calculated the total overtims for the month.
meanings.sent3: The overtims from last week made her paycheck pleasantly surprising.
meanings.sent4: The stack of papers on his desk represented countless overtims.
meanings.sent5: The overtims on his record showed his dedication to his job.
